title: NA TALENT - WORST PLAYS IN LCS HISTORY

embed.description: I don't think I have seen anything worse than this in lcs, maybe even bronze... wanted to share this with you guys before the compilation. This deserves it's own video ;p Working on the compilation right now, should be finished soon!

body:
"Did they shut down the turret?" - RivingtonThe3rd
"ahh, I don't know these teams" - Remilia
"That was the best game I've ever watched" - LilyPichu
"That was a game of league of legends" - scarra
"Kappa" - Twitch Chat

Grazie Renegades vs Dignitas.
Never change NA.
